mapper.insert: insert into matches(home, writer, stadium, starttime, endtime, event) values(#{home}, #{writer}, #{stadium}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{event})
mapper.update: update matches set away = #{teamname} where mno = #{mno}
mapper.select: select * from matches where 1 = 1 order by mno desc, starttime desc
select * from matches where 1 = 1 order by mno desc, starttime desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
